name: Cowbell Fever HD
description:
Cowbell Fever is the music game you have all been waiting for. Play the cowbell to 16 Licensed Songs including (Don't Fear) The Reaper, and 10 Bonus Tracks. Join our Hero on his Psychedelic Quest to become a music legend.

*Note About the Price: The game's higher price is due to licensed music. Royalties are paid on every copy sold. The majority of the songs used in the game are the Master recordings by the original artist.

Cowbell Fever delivers a music experience like no other game before it.

Cowbell Fever has a rockin' assortment of licensed and original music that prominently feature the cowbell in all of its glory.

You may think the cowbell is an easy instrument to play. Think Again. The songs here will challenge even the best cowbell players out there.

This game isn't just about tapping the screen, it is about our Hero's journey to become a music legend. The Story Mode features over 30 minutes of hand drawn animation.

The Bonus Tracks explore the space by leaving the 70's vibe behind and give you a chance to play cowbell to Drum and Bass, and even Dubstep!

Songs Include:
“Down on the Corner” by Creedence Clearwater Revival
“Hair of the Dog” by Nazareth
“Little Willy” as made famous by Sweet
“Cowbell Blues”
“Incense and Peppermints” by Strawberry Alarm Clock
“Evil Ways” as made famous by Santana
“Time Has Come Today” as made famous by The Chambers Brothers
“Give and Take”
“Annabelle”
“Got to Give it Up” by Marvin Gaye
“Better by the Pound” by Funkadelic
“Funkify”
“Rock Me” by Steppenwolf
“Good to Your Earhole” by Funkadelic
“(Don’t Fear) The Reaper” as made famous by Blue Oyster Cult
“More Cowbell”

Bonus Tracks:
“Wacky Tobacky”
“Ohm”
“Kung Fu Fro”
“Cowbell Duel”
“More Cowbell (Remix)”
“DNB Bell”
“Wobble Funk”
“Bass Bell”
“More Cowbell (Dubstep)”
“Mad Cowbell Disease”

*Original Soundtrack also available on iTunes.

Designed to run on iPhone 3GS and higher.
